thread.title: All The Times Justin Timberlake Owned The Oscars
thread.title_full: All The Times Justin Timberlake Owned The Oscars

title: All The Times Justin Timberlake Owned The Oscars
text:
All The Times Justin Timberlake Owned The Oscars posted by Nicole Mastrogiannis - share 
Justin Timberlake literally couldn't stop the feeling ... of pure joy at the Oscars this year. Not only was he nominated   his chart-topping hit single "Can't Stop The Feeling" from Trolls (which is also up for an iHeartRadio Music Award for Song of the Year, Best Song from a Movie, and Best Music Video), but he also opened the show singing and dance, dance, dance, dancing away to the track. 
No doubt, Justin had a lot to be happy about during the Oscars, he had many great moments on the red carpet, on stage, and more proving he basically had the best time ever. Take a look below:   That time he crept up on Emma Stone: This big pimpin' moment: This "OH NO, SHE DIDN'T" move: This instance of glorious hilarity: This absolutely accurate tutorial on how to properly pose on the red carpet: And this absolute #couplesgoals moment: 
Photo: Getty Images
